name: Mewtwo

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to use this attack. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo.

flavorText: A scientist created this Pokémon after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

strengths: Psychic scales with opponent's energy - punishes setup decks
Barrier provides complete protection for a turn
weaknesses: 60 HP is low for a main attacker
Psychic weakness means mirror matches are dangerous
synergies: Energy Removal - Keep opponent's energy low while Psychic scales
counters: Energy Removal - Keep your Psychic energy off

competitiveHistory: Mewtwo was a staple in many decks as a counter to energy-heavy strategies like Rain Dance. Psychic could deal massive damage against Pokemon loaded with energy. Barrier provided a defensive option but was less commonly used due to energy discard. The Psychic weakness created interesting mirror match dynamics.

rulings.ruling: Psychic counts all Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokemon, including Special Energy.
Double Colorless Energy counts as 1 Energy card for Psychic's bonus damage (not 2).
Barrier prevents all damage AND effects from attacks, including status conditions.
You must discard a Psychic Energy to use Barrier. If you cannot, you cannot use the attack.
Barrier's protection lasts until the end of your opponent's next turn.
